content: 你好
你好！有什么具体需求可以告诉我，比如是在TikTok Mall销售相关有问题，还是关于项目搭建、文档使用方面有疑问呢？详细说说以便我更好地为你提供帮助。
我想买东西，推荐一下

以下是为你推荐的一些商品：
 - 商品名称：Notebook，描述为 “The cloudwego notebook is a highly efficient and feature-rich notebook designed to meet all your note-taking needs. ”，价格9.9。
 - 商品名称：Mouse-Pad，描述为 “The cloudwego mouse pad is a premium-grade accessory designed to enhance your computer usage experience. ”，价格8.8。
 - 商品名称：mascot，描述为 “The cloudwego mascot is a charming and captivating representation of the brand, designed to bring joy and a playful spirit to any environment.”，价格4.8 。 

如果你对某个商品感兴趣，想进一步了解或有添加到购物车等操作，都可以告诉我。
刚刚你推荐的商品每个各来3个加入购物车里吧
很抱歉，在查询商品信息时遇到了问题，无法获取到商品的准确ID ，导致不能为你将刚刚推荐的商品各3个添加到购物车。请检查商品类别或名称是否准确，或尝试其他查找商品的方式。若有其他需要，你可以更换问题再次提问。

- 商品名称：Notebook，描述为 “The cloudwego notebook is a highly efficient and feature-rich notebook designed to meet all your note-taking needs. ”，价格9.9。
- 商品名称：Mouse-Pad，描述为 “The cloudwego mouse pad is a premium-grade accessory designed to enhance your computer usage experience. ”，价格8.8。
- 商品名称：mascot，描述为 “The cloudwego mascot is a charming and captivating representation of the brand, designed to bring joy and a playful spirit to any environment.”，价格4.8 。

以下为你推荐一些商品及其商品id：

 - 商品名称：Mouse-Pad，商品id为2，描述为 “The cloudwego mouse pad is a premium-grade accessory designed to enhance your computer usage experience. ”，价格8.8。
 - 商品名称：mascot，商品id为7，描述为 “The cloudwego mascot is a charming and captivating representation of the brand, designed to bring joy and a playful spirit to any environment.”，价格4.8 。 

如果你想将某个或某些商品加入购物车，可以告诉我具体商品id和数量等信息，我可以帮你看看下一步操作。
你好
你好！有什么具体需求吗？无论是关于商品推荐、购物车操作，还是项目相关的咨询（比如项目搭建、文档查看等），都可以详细说说。
我想买东西，推荐一下

为你推荐这些商品：
- 商品名称：Notebook，商品id为1，描述为 “The cloudwego notebook is a highly efficient and feature-rich notebook designed to meet all your note-taking needs. ”，价格9.9。
- 商品名称：Mouse-Pad，商品id为2，描述为 “The cloudwego mouse pad is a premium-grade accessory designed to enhance your computer usage experience. ”，价格8.8。
- 商品名称：mascot，商品id为7，描述为 “The cloudwego mascot is a charming and captivating representation of the brand, designed to bring joy and a playful spirit to any environment.”，价格4.8 。 
- 商品名称：T-Shirt，商品id为3，描述为 “The cloudwego t-shirt is a stylish and comfortable clothing item that allows you to showcase your fashion sense while enjoying maximum comfort.”，价格6.6。
- 商品名称：T-Shirt，商品id为4，描述为 “The cloudwego t-shirt is a stylish and comfortable clothing item that allows you to showcase your fashion sense while enjoying maximum comfort.”，价格2.2。
- 商品名称：Sweatshirt，商品id为5，描述为 “The cloudwego Sweatshirt is a cozy and fashionable garment that provides warmth and style during colder weather.”，价格1.1。
- 商品名称：T-Shirt，商品id为6，描述为 “The cloudwego t-shirt is a stylish and comfortable clothing item that allows you to showcase your fashion sense while enjoying maximum comfort.”，价格1.8。 

如果你确定要购买，我可以帮你处理加入购物车等后续操作。
刚刚你推荐的商品每个各来3个加入购物车里吧

- Mouse-Pad，价格8.8，数量3
- mascot，价格4.8，数量3

- Sweatshirt，价格1.1，数量3
- T-Shirt（商品id为6的款式），价格1.8，数量3
